notesStmt.note: Hesbert gives a full text for this antiphon, not otherwise represented in CAO sources, which he derives from "plusieurs autres sources" (not identified): Mulier quae erat in civitate peccatrix attulit alabastrum unguenti et stans secus pedes Jesu lacrimis coepit rigare pedes eius et capillis capitis sui tergebat

ant.aBody: Mulier quae erat in civitate peccatrix
